Welcome!

Say "Hello!" to Salt River Studios, an up-and-coming, small indie game team. Right now, this is just a placeholder website; however, there are great plans for this site in the future!

Contact Us

Have a request, suggestion, or other question? Talk to us! Most methods are for generalized support, but you can still contact specific members of our team. To contact a specific member, whether they're a friend or just your favorite, use the company email designated with "srs" followed by a period and their full name (not including middle name/initial; e.x. srs.johndoe@gmail.com). The icons below link to each general contact method in order from left to right in likeliness and timeliness of a response. No guarantees for a response on any platform.
